trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte a uma ação de gatilho que retoma um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> em pausa.

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Use esta classe com uma <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para retomar a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> objeto somente pode retomar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> que está em pausa e não tem nenhum efeito um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> em qualquer outro estado.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> não pode ser controlado interativamente após ele ser iniciado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard" />.
